Package semsim.reading

Class OMEXmanifestReader

java.lang.Object
semsim.reading.OMEXmanifestReader
public class OMEXmanifestReader
extends java.lang.Object
Contains methods for reading an OMEX archive

    • getManifestEntries

      public static java.util.ArrayList<org.jdom.Element> getManifestEntries​(java.util.zip.ZipFile zarchive, java.io.File arcfile) throws org.jdom.JDOMException, java.io.IOException
      Get all entries in an OMEX archive's manifest and return the paths of any valid model formats
      Parameters:
      zarchive - ZipFile instance of the archive
      arcfile - Location of the archive
      Returns:
      A list of JDOM Elements corresponding to the readable models in the archive's manifest
      Throws:
      org.jdom.JDOMException
      java.io.IOException

    • archiveContainsModelFile

      public static boolean archiveContainsModelFile​(java.util.zip.ZipFile archive, java.io.File omexfile, java.io.File modelfile) throws org.jdom.JDOMException, java.io.IOException
      Check if a file within an OMEX archive already exists
      Parameters:
      archive - ZipFile instance of an OMEX archive
      omexfile - Location of OMEX archive
      modelfile - Location of model within archive
      Returns:
      Whether the archive already contains a file that matches the input File
      Throws:
      org.jdom.JDOMException
      java.io.IOException
